(e) Based on your answer to part (c)(ii), if the expected inflation rate in Stoneway in Year <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> was <math alttext="15%" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>15</mn><mo>%</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>, what would be the effect on real <math alttext="G D P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> as the economy adjusts to its long-run equilibrium? Explain.
